info.summary:
Jan Vanthienen works as a professor in Katholieke Universiteit Leuven
Faculty of Economics and Applied Economics
Department of Decision Sciences and Information, and his\her h-index is 35, g-index is 72. His\Her interests are :
 Decision Table; Neural Network; Process Mining; Data Mining; Information System;
